name: #1 "Transferência" [Live🔴] performance (Lucas-PC-GAMER_+_DjDani3DS)
description:
#1 Transferência.
Length: 00:56:14
Bitrate: 112KBs

Recording of the improvised performance (Transferência) at the opening of the exhibition "Um pouco de sonho e o resto do óbvio,/A little of dream and the residual obvious," at Galeria Refresco, located in the Santo Cristo neighborhood in the city of Rio de Janeiro.

Performed on the sound of Transferência: 
Daniella Avelar (instagram.com/daniela_avellar)
and Lucas Lucas (@lucas414141_9)

Floor access is from Fujioka.
(instagram.com/fujiok1331odafg)

Responsible for the audio recording was Julio Sta Cecilia. (instagram.com/juliostacecilia) 
@sugarmorphoses4


Equipment:
1.Cassette tapes; 
2.Computer; 
3.Nintendo 3DS.
